message: You are currently offline. This is cached data that may not be up to date.

notifications.title: Offline Mode
notifications.message: You are viewing cached data while offline.

attendance.message: Attendance data is not available offline. Your recent actions will sync when you're back online.

user.message: Your user profile is available in offline mode with limited functionality.
